    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeDownClient()
      Shuts down the set up client process (also referred to as admin client) Server will continue running if it has not been shut down
      void closeDownServer()
      Writes server contents to file Shuts down server process
      void connectToService()
      Look up the remote service
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void menu()
      Displays menu with options for actions the set up user can perform
      void requestQuizClose()
      Closes the quiz when the the set up client provides the id Gets player details and score for the winner of the game from server Displays a notification of the winner and their score to the user
      void setUpNewQuizFromFile()
      Prompts for a quiz name Generates a collection of questions based on data provided in a csv file and calls createNewQuiz for server to set up a new quiz Gets id back from the server
      void setUpNewQuizManually()
      Prompts the user for a name and list of questions for the quiz, calls the createNewQuiz method on server to generate a new quiz Gets the id back the server
